title: Maintenance work on the Sengkang LRT system

title_translations.zh-Hans: 盛港轻轨系统维修工程
title_translations.ms: Kerja penyelenggaraan di sistem LRT Sengkang

updates.text:
We will be conducting maintenance work on the Sengkang LRT system this Sunday, 15 July 2018. 

Train service will be available as usual at all stations, but only in one direction. Service in the opposite direction will start at 5.30pm. https://t.co/vTq3YNH9fD
